snippet.title: Call of Boba Early Access is OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Call of Boba Early Access is Out Now!

Get ready for the sweetest adventure of your life! 🧋✨


In Call of Boba, you’ll step into the adorable world of a cozy tea shop where you craft delicious milk teas and fend off nightmares in dream-like battles. With soothing gameplay and a unique blend of management and action, Call of Boba is a cozy game designed for all who love a relaxing experience with a twist of excitement!


Download the game on our official game page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2342690/Call_Of_Boba/
